function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation provision due to tightly constructed buildings and space restrictions.","Impact":"Increased risk of indoor airborne diseases and pollutants due to poor air quality.","Mitigation":"Implementation of mechanical ventilation systems, regular maintenance, and careful design of building ventilation systems.","Technologies":"Mechanical ventilation systems, air purifiers, and CO2 sensors.","People":"Building occupants, especially in densely populated areas.","Owner":"Building designers, architects, and facilities management."},{"Description":"Transport and advection of aerosols and bio-aerosols within the indoor environment.","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases within the indoor environment.","Mitigation":"Improvement of ventilation flow, use of air filtration systems, and implementation of biosecurity measures.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HEPA filters, and UV-C disinfection systems.","People":"Building occupants and visitors.","Owner":"Facilities management and building maintenance teams."}]}
